trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: 処理するメソッドを表す、 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref>と<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref>ルーティング イベントだけでなく関連添付イベントおよびイベントをプレビューします。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: このデリゲートは、次の添付イベントを使用します- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>このデリゲートは、次のルーティング イベントの基本要素でと共に使用されます。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> 。

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: これらのルーティング イベントがより一般的な要素のモデルにアクセスできるようにする上記のアタッチされたイベントを転送[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]です。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>添付イベントおよび基本要素のルーティング イベントのイベント データを共有し、バブルとトンネル ルーティング イベントのバージョンは、イベント データを共有も</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: イベント ルートをたどる際は、イベントの処理の特性に影響することができます。
詳細については、「[入力概要](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)です。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: 場合、<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>イベントまたは<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>イベントが処理される (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>に設定されている`true`イベント データの)、キーボード フォーカスは変わりません</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus></xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>。
